  • Method Details

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame​(Ship chosenShip)
      Creates a new game with the chosen ship by player. Sets the scene and window with the values from the Controller.
      Parameters:
      chosenShip - is selected for the player in the game

    • countDownTimer

      public void countDownTimer​(Ship ship, int delay)
      Implements a count down timer and sets the ships in a countdown mode. After completion it starts a new game.
      Parameters:
      ship - selected for the game.
      delay - time for the scene to display.

    • createShipCountDown

      public void createShipCountDown​(Ship ship)
      Ships are displayed accordingly in a countdown mode.
      Parameters:
      ship - to be displayed in countdown scene

    • update

      public void update​(PlayerModel player, java.util.List<EnemyAIModel> enemies, java.util.List<BulletModel> bullets)
      Updates the game grid with the current state . Enemies, players movement will decide the updation.
      Parameters:
      player - Player Model
      enemies - Enemy Model
      bullets - Bullet Model

    • getGameScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getGameScene()
      Gets the current state of game scene where it paused.
      Returns:
      Scene i.e. current state of the game.

    • getGvRowCount

      public int getGvRowCount()
      Gets the count of the Row.
      Returns:
      int row count.

    • setGvRowCount

      public void setGvRowCount​(int rowCount)
      Sets the count of the Row. Initialises the game grid.
      Parameters:
      rowCount - the row count

    • getGvColumnCount

      public int getGvColumnCount()
      Gets the count of the Column.
      Returns:
      int column count.

    • setGvColumnCount

      public void setGvColumnCount​(int columnCount)
      Sets the count of the Row. Initialises the game grid.
      Parameters:
      columnCount - the column count
